title: Riot finally listened to people like me! (OCE Esports Announcement)
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/2015-oceanic-competitive-season

I've been saying this since they announced the plan for the ***2014*** Esport Season and it's finally happening - weekly games.

This season in OCE has probably been equivalent to 2012 NA and EUW Pro Scene. Now it's time for OCE, just like NA and EUW, to take the next step and that is adopting the LCS format.

GJ RIOT OCE. You're making good moves.

replies.body: They're at least NA Challenger series level. Every region has to take this step at some point anyway. Who knows... we could really develop competitively as a region from this.
I'll be seeing you guys when I'm pro.
